cn list BOX

Lists the indicated box. The object references are shown as "cn open envelope …" command, which can be executed to display the corresponding envelope. Change the command to "cn get …" to download the raw object, or "cn show record …" to show it as record.

cn list

Lists all boxes of the selected key pair.

cn list BOXLABEL

Lists only the indicated box of the selected key pair. BOXLABEL may be:

message box
public box
private box
cn list my boxes
cn list my BOXLABEL

Lists your own boxes.

cn list [BOXLABEL of] ACTORGROUP|ACCOUNT

Lists boxes of an actor group, or account.

cn list [BOXLABEL of] KEYPAIR|ACTOR [on STORE]

Lists boxes of an actor on the specified or selected store.

Syntax

Open
